mapper.select: SELECT biomass_forest_grassland.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(biomass_forest_grassland.scc_code,1,2) AS scc1,SUBSTR(biomass_forest_grassland.scc_code,3,2) AS scc2, SUBSTR(biomass_forest_grassland.scc_code,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(biomass_forest_grassland.scc_code,8,3) AS scc4 FROM biomass_forest_grassland LEFT JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=biomass_forest_grassland.county_id where biomass_forest_grassland.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into biomass_forest_grassland
id,
county_id,
scc_code,
source_descrip,
VEGETATION_TYPES,
fire_area,
DRY_BIOMASS,
BURNING_RATIO,
note,
year,
pm10_emission,
pm25_emission,
co_emission,
voc_emission,
pm_emission,
so2_emission,
nox_emission,
nh3_emission,
oc_emission,
bc_emission,

insert into biomass_forest_grassland (id, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, VEGETATION_TYPES, fire_area, DRY_BIOMASS, BURNING_RATIO, note, year, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, voc_emission, pm_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, nh3_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vegetationTypes,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fireArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dryBiomass,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{burningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{.countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, scc_code = #{.sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_descrip = #{.sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEGETATION_TYPES = #{.vegetationTypes,jdbcType=CHAR}, fire_area = #{.fireArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DRY_BIOMASS = #{.dryBiomass,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BURNING_RATIO = #{.burningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, note = #{.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{.year,jdbcType=CHAR}, pm10_emission = #{.pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{.pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{.coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{.vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm_emission = #{.pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{.so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{.noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{.nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{.ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{.bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}

INSERT INTO biomass_forest_grassland (id, county_id, scc_code, source_descrip, VEGETATION_TYPES, fire_area, DRY_BIOMASS, BURNING_RATIO, note, year, pm10_emission, pm25_emission, co_emission, voc_emission, pm_emission, so2_emission, nox_emission, nh3_emission, oc_emission, bc_emission) VALUES
( id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{item.countyId,jdbcType=CHAR}, scc_code = #{item.sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_descrip = #{item.sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEGETATION_TYPES = #{item.vegetationTypes,jdbcType=CHAR}, fire_area = #{item.fireArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DRY_BIOMASS = #{item.dryBiomass,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BURNING_RATIO = #{item.burningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, note = #{item.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{item.year,jdbcType=CHAR}, pm10_emission = #{item.pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm25_emission = #{item.pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co_emission = #{item.coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, voc_emission = #{item.vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pm_emission = #{item.pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, so2_emission = #{item.so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nox_emission = #{item.noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nh3_emission = #{item.nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oc_emission = #{item.ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bc_emission = #{item.bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )
mapper.update:
update biomass_forest_grassland
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=CHAR},
scc_code = #{sccCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_descrip = #{sourceDescrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEGETATION_TYPES = #{vegetationTypes,jdbcType=CHAR},
fire_area = #{fireArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DRY_BIOMASS = #{dryBiomass,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BURNING_RATIO = #{burningRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
pm10_emission = #{pm10Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm25_emission = #{pm25Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
co_emission = #{coEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
voc_emission = #{vocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pm_emission = #{pmEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
so2_emission = #{so2Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nox_emission = #{noxEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
nh3_emission = #{nh3Emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
oc_emission = #{ocEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
bc_emission = #{bcEmission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
